Package src

Class Customer

java.lang.Object
src.Customer
Direct Known Subclasses:
Admin
public class Customer extends Object
Customer HAS-A card and is responsible for the customer object. Provides methods to both access and modify its name, card, and card details. Also provides a purchase() method that works in tandem with the charge() method in Card.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Ahmed-Hassan Odtallah

      public boolean purchase(PC item) throws InsufficientFundsException
      Attempts to make a purchase using the customer's payment card.
      Parameters:
      item - to purchase.
      Returns:
      True if the purchase is successful, false if there are insufficient funds.
